meaningMnemonic: You need to <radical>stop</radical> a <radical>drunkard</radical> from going down a <radical>slide</radical> with a <radical>jackhammer</radical> to ask him how many <kanji>years old</kanji> he is. He's doing a lot of dangerous things right now, and they all have age limits.
readingMnemonic: When you ask him how many <kanji>years old</kanji> he is, he turns to you and screams, "I'M A MILLION YEARS OLD AND YOU'LL NEVER STOP ME!" That's obviously not how old this kid is, so you take out your holy blue <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) and slice the slide in half. Then the jackhammer. Then the kid's metal arm—wait! This kid is a <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい)!
